reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's color and find it comfortable. The dress receives mixed feedback about its fit, with some finding the length great while others say it's too short. The material quality is also mixed, with some finding it nice while others describe it as thin. Several customers report the dress is see-through and has poor quality. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!!!
items.body: I LOVE this dress! The color is just like the picture and the open back really makes it feel special. It is a little wide in the top, but I was able to put a small stitch in to help with that, so not a problem for me personally. Read more
items.author: Jaycie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sizing and so is the style
items.body: I was really excited about the style of this dress, but what came out of the bag I was not impressed with. I did not think it was well cut, and the straps easily come down since there’s not a lot of backing. I’ve had other dresses with the style straps, stay on the shoulder. I also think the sizing doesn’t fit how they’re made. I ordered a medium and they were enormous. . I didn’t mind the fabric. I thought it was light and airy. I just think the design of the dress was tough and didn’t work well with that style.. Read more
items.author: LadyFrenchMaze

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute
items.body: Such a cute dress!!!!!! I REALLY wish it would’ve worked for me. Unfortunately I am not blessed up top, so you could see everything in the gaps of the dress. But that is on me, not anything to do with the quality of the dress. Just not really a good option for very small breasted women. Read more
items.author: Faith

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too much fabric
items.body: Dress fits okay. The part of the dress that goes under your armpit is loose and bunches up. Read more
items.author: Madison Mielke

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Different from advertising
items.body: Far too short the back does not hang down as advertised it was good material and good layering of material, sewn well but not the shape as advertised. I had to return this item Read more
items.author: Lauren Ingle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: Material is comfortable and quality fits great I’m 5”10 and its was a good length great for the talk girlies Read more
items.author: Shae

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works with a baby bump!
items.body: Such a cute dress. Loved the color and fit a baby bump well! The material is nice that it’s not too thick. Perfect for a spring/summer dress. I did have to put a ribbon on the back to tie the straps together as it was a little loose. But it is possible without the bump it would fit a little better! Read more
items.author: Ash

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feminine and flowy
items.body: This dress is very cute. Light weight and flowy. Perfect these last few days as it’s been so incredibly HOT! It is lined partially, not see thru. I LOVE the color. And I love that it’s so loose and feminine! I will order in another color. I wasn’t expecting the material to be so silky but it’s actually nice Read more
items.author: AC0520

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Solid Hotpink, Solid Light Pink, Solid White, Solid Mint Blue, Pure Yellow, Solid Black, Solid Red, Solid Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
